name: Spaceport Container Storage Key
description: Unlocks a location in The Spaceport
recommended_route: Approach from the northeast side, use upper catwalks to avoid open sightlines.
notes: Popular PvP hotspot; expect campers near the stairwell.

name: Dam Control Center Tower Key
description: Unlocks a location in Dam Battlegrounds
recommended_route: Use the zipline from the south side to minimize exposure.
notes: Good mid-game stop if youâ€™re rotating through the southeast dam area.

name: Stella Montis Archives Key
description: Unlocks a location in Stella Montis
recommended_route: Enter from the west corridor, clear side rooms first, then push into the main archive hall.
notes: One of the best PvE loot rooms; worth prioritizing if you have the key.
loot: Epic crates, High-value blueprints, Rare materials

name: Raider Hatch Key
recommended_route: Check your map for hatch locations.
notes: Can be purchased, crafted, quest reward, or looted from players. Used for quick extraction.

name: Dam Surveillance Key
description: Unlocks a location in Dam Battlegrounds

name: Dam Staff Room Key
description: Unlocks a location in Dam Battlegrounds
notes: Unlocks a staff room near the Control Tower.

name: Dam Testing Annex Key
description: Unlocks a location in Dam Battlegrounds
recommended_route: Southeastern corner of the Dam Battlegrounds.
notes: Use on one of two locked doors to loot the room.

name: Spaceport Ground Control Key
description: Unlocks a location in The Spaceport
recommended_route: Control tower near center of the map, a little to the west.
